text: Fair food at hawker setting with air conditioned.
The food is very good and authentic. Happy to have found regional Chinese food in my area. Did not have any issues with wait time. Highly recommend.

I will never go there again even if it's close from my home. The service is terrible and like everyone's review, the serving is horribly slow. I just ordered the small dish but it takes approximately 40min. and they started to cook when I ask what time should I wait more.

Want to lift the negative reviews from the naysayers. Quality is restaurant quality, but at a fraction of the price. A great local spot for Chinese classics. Yes they can get busy, but it's only one uncle that is cooking, but still haven't had a bad experience. Best food at dairy farm for sure

Food is quite ok, but same as other low rate review, super super slow. Yeah, there is only 1 cook, but you should make by sequence, I wait 40 mins for my dishes and the other people come later than me already got there dishes. Also the price is not cheap, serving size also quite small.
